subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Rachel Alexandra was installed as the 8-5 morning line favorite for the Preakness when entries were taken Wednesday at Pimlico, and she will start from post 13 in the 13-horse field.
snippet: Rachel Alexandra was installed as the 8-5 morning line favorite for the Preakness when entries were taken Wednesday at Pimlico, and she will start from post 13 in the 13-horse field.
